english.segment1: I remember the first time . 'Til I see beyond the storm. Surrounding me with Your love. I turn to find You near
english.segment2: You take me higher. You lift my head to open skies. Your fire burns within my soul. Abandoned to Your call
english.segment3: Your love reached deep. Into my world. You read me. Like an open book
english.segment4: You took all the pieces. And made my life complete. In You. I soar on the heights. Of Your love. Dive the depths of Your grace
english.segment5: You take me higher. 'Til I see beyond the storm. Surrounding me with Your love. I turn to find You near
english.segment6: You take me higher. You lift my head to open skies. Your fire burns within my soul. Abandoned to Your call
english.segment7: I take the hand of One. Who knows me. From the inside out. He guides me through. The streets of life
english.segment8: He take me through. Open doors. They open onto fields of white. He tells me to see. And perceive. And to hear their cry
english.segment9: You take me higher. 'Til I see beyond the storm. Surrounding me with Your love. I turn to find You near
english.segment10: You take me higher. You lift my head to open skies. Your fire burns within my soul. Abandoned to Your call
